name: Russian Bolivian English Swiss (Sperrylite, Pyrargyrite, Chalcocite, Hematite with rutile
description:
This work is a commentary on the natural resources extracted from mineral-rich countries and the assignment of more rights and privileges to cross borders than some people in minority, marginalized, and vulnerable communities.

It is also a reflection of the physical traits from different races recognizable and perpetually on display in one being. These visual signifiers of race, in some cases, reinforce essentialist, either/or thinking and harmful stereotypes, which can dictate who does or does not have the access to travel freely around the world.
